paper.title: A Survey of the Individual Claim Size and Other Risk Factors Using Credibility Bonus-Malus Premiums
paper.abstract: In this paper, a flexible count regression model based on a bivariate compound Poisson distribution is introduced in order to distinguish between different types of claims according to the claim size. Furthermore, it allows us to analyse the factors that affect the number of claims above and below a given claim size threshold in an automobile insurance portfolio. Relevant properties of this model are given. Next, a mixed regression model is derived to compute credibility bonus-malus premiums based on the individual claim size and other risk factors such as gender, type of vehicle, driving area, or age of the vehicle. Results are illustrated by using a well-known automobile insurance portfolio dataset.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究的是汽车保险中的索赔大小和风险因素分析，以及基于这些因素计算可信度奖金-惩罚保费。虽然涉及风险管理，但属于保险领域而非金融风险管理、衍生品定价或投资组合管理。
